Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory172.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I will release them as promised, so you should...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Mngh... What is it this time? Why do things never go my way?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia has Kamui and Chrome surrounded by the Corrupted, but her next command is interrupted by a ranged attack.'}
{3: 'Standing at the corner of the street is a familiar-looking Phecda. Before Chrome could identify the figure, Kamui has already realized that it was the Phecda they saved in the industrial zone.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Phecda A', 3: 'Constructs of Babylonia, pick up your weapons, quick.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Phecda fires at Lamia as he speaks. Without much in the way of defense, Lamia is forced to let go of the hostage to dodge the attacks.'}
{3: 'Kamui quickly retrieves his surrendered greatsword through a swift kick. In one flowing motion, he cuts a Corrupted in half and catches the Construct released by Lamia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Phecda B', 3: 'Constructs secured here too!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Some distance away, the second Phecda has secured the other group of hostages—a stealth effort while Lamia was distracted.'}
{3: 'Knowing full well that they cannot last long in this highly viral environment, the two rescue agents retreat behind the defense line immediately.'}
{3: "The two's actions are met with bewilderment from the other Kowloong guards."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard A', 3: "Why bother saving them Babylonians? Lady Qu didn't order us to.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Phecda B', 3: 'Because they saved us before.', 4: '1'}
{3: '"We aren\'t disobeying orders, we are repaying kindness." Thus replies the Phecda.'}
{2: 'Phecda B', 3: 'Our belief is to save everything that has value. Though Babylonia might walk a different path, are not their brave warriors, fighting on the streets, valuable?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Phecda B', 3: 'And that belief in value is what unites us as a community. So, hey, you all are gonna help out, yeah?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard Captain', 3: "We alone can't put a dent in that Ascendant, but—!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'The guards have already realized what they should do, and their captain speaks for all of them.'}
{2: 'Guard Captain', 3: '—We can fire outside of the highly viral regions! Use our firepower to separate the Corrupted from the Ascendants! Take some heat off of the Babylonians!', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The guards join the formation to cover Kamui and Chrome, allowing them to make the most of their experience as vanguards to corner Lamia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "W-what's happening? I thought Kowloong hated everyone else!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hah. Seems like they hate you the most!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Tch... That's why I hate you smiley clutz-heads. Well, Roland's retreated too, so I guess I'll also—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You're not getting away, Ascendant!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Hold on, Kamui!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "Chrome shouts, stopping Kamui before he dashes for Lamia. Clouds of smoke, at the same time, disperse from the slithering portions of Lamia's body."}
{3: "Another of Lamia's feats—decompressing the virus within her to create a zone of such viral density, that even her surroundings fog up."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "See, that's why I wanted no part of this...!"}
